channel.title: Client Help? BROKENX2
channel.description:
ok. so ive changed the server = 127.0.0.1 to my no-ip. my port if forwarded. my server is up. google says the server is up. my no-ip duc is updated + running.
And i still get error connecting to server? Im using Broken x2. I cant connect to my server on moparscape client either.
Help please?

item.title: Client Help? BROKENX2
item.dc:creator: @iiLovePVP iiLovePVP
item.description:
@iiLovePVP wrote:

oh yh u need to change the ip of client i did u see were it says localhost u put it ur ip and 0.0.0.0 put ur ip there i put it in dis is it right survivescape.no-ip.biz?

and ur server is off or it doesnt work…

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help? BROKENX2
item.dc:creator: @Delta1wolf Delta1wolf
item.description:
@Delta1wolf wrote:

[quote=“iiLovePVP, post:4, topic:412603”]i got aim and hotmail not skype sorry upload yours to uppit and i will download

I am also using BrokenX V2 :D[/quote]

here u go
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/36137077/SurviveScape%20Client%20V1.rar

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help? BROKENX2
item.dc:creator: @expozee expozee
item.description:
@expozee wrote:

the same thing happened to me for some reason you cant connect to your server from ur ip, u need to connect from a localhost, ex. 127.0.0.1, but other players can connect from ur ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help? BROKENX2
item.dc:creator: @Delta1wolf Delta1wolf
item.description:
@Delta1wolf wrote:

[quote=“iiLovePVP, post:2, topic:412603”]Basically you have to connect to 127.0.0.1 and other people have to connect to your no-ip so upload your client after it has uploaded get the link paste it in a notepad document and then change the ip of the client to 127.0.0.1 so you can connect. Then post the link of client for other people to play.

Easy Peasy :D[/quote]

can you test mine?

do you have skype

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help? BROKENX2
item.dc:creator: @iiLovePVP iiLovePVP
item.description:
@iiLovePVP wrote:

Basically you have to connect to 127.0.0.1 and other people have to connect to your no-ip so upload your client after it has uploaded get the link paste it in a notepad document and then change the ip of the client to 127.0.0.1 so you can connect. Then post the link of client for other people to play.

Easy Peasy

Read full topic
